item.title: docker-compose
item.description: Docker compose Basic example # docker-compose.yml version: '2' services: web: build: . # build from Dockerfile context: ./Path dockerfile: Dockerfile ports: - "5000:5000" volumes: - .:/code redis: image: redis Reference Building web: # build from Dockerfile build: . # build from custom Dockerfile build: context: ./dir dockerfile: Dockerfile.dev # build from image image: ubuntu image: ubuntu:14.04 image: tutum/influxdb image: example-registry:4000/postgresql image: a4bc65fd Ports ports: - "3000" - "8000:80" # guest:host # expose ports to linked services (not to host) expose: ["3000"] Commands # command to execute command: bundle exec thin -p 3000 command: [bundle, exec, thin, -p, 3000] # override the entrypoint entrypoint: /app/start.
